bio: [Dave Cross](https://davecross.co.uk/)  is a veteran Perl programmer with extensive expertise in developing innovative and efficient software solutions. With a strong presence in the Perl community, he has contributed numerous modules and shared his knowledge through talks and workshops. Outside of coding, Dave enjoys delving into open-source projects and collaborating with fellow enthusiasts. He hates writing bio lines, so he gives that job to ChatGPT.
name: Dave Cross
